fields.summary: MobileWeb: Support native Safari scrolling for ScrollView and all scrollable elements

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
we definitely need to implement better web based scrolling 

Joe has a nice implementation

https://github.com/joehewitt/scrollability/

Also in iOS5 beta 2 there is a fix for better scrolling

http://johanbrook.com/browsers/native-momentum-scrolling-ios-5/
